snippet: Three days after it was reported that Brett Anderson, the well-regarded restaurant critic for The Times-Picayune, was among about 200 employees being laid off, the paper said Friday that it had offered Mr. Anderson a job.
abstract: The Times-Picayune in New Orleans says that it has offered Brett Anderson a job, days after the paper laid off the well-regarded restaurant critic along with 200 other employees.
lead_paragraph: Three days after it was reported that Brett Anderson, the well-regarded restaurant critic for The Times-Picayune, was among about 200 employees being laid off, the paper said Friday that it had offered Mr. Anderson a job.

headline.main: Louisiana: Dining Critic Has a Job, Paper Says
